name: Cubito
description:
Cubito is a top-down arena shooter focused on bullet blocking mechanics, pew pew pew pew and some paw paw paw.

Face all those geometric figures that have been revealed                                                       from the   _ｖａｐｏｒｎｅｔ  and proclaim yourself the polygon master!

Instructions (Explained in-game as well)
  • W A S D or Arrow keys to move.
  • Toggle with Lshift or Rshift to Sprint/Crouch.
  • Mouse for Aim.
  • Left click to shoot.
  • Esc or P to pause and options menu (Visual effects are fully customizable).
  • Make your bullets collide at the bullets of your enemies and you'll gain bullet power in order to get an upgrade!

This game was created as an intentional experiment for our studio using Unity2D for the first time!

Check out web versions

Newgrounds Version - 3.8~/5, featured and got top 2th the day it was released!

Kongregate Version     - 3.7~/5,  featured and badged.

ArmorGames Version - 84/100, featured in frontpage.

[Want our game in your site? contact me at jesus@heizhugames.com and we'll gladly talk about it.]
